en-US.description:
*** You can ask Alexa to pronounce a word given its spelling. Works with all English words. In case Alexa misheard you or suspects that you provided an incorrect spelling, she will still pronounce the word and then will give you some suggestions on what the correct spelling could be.

This skill works well if you enunciate the letters clearly and slowly.

The skill is designed for both voice-only Alexa devices and Alexa devices with a screen.
examplePhrases: Alexa, open pronunciations and pronounce A. L. E. X. A.
Alexa, ask pronunciations how to pronounce A. M. A. Z. O. N.
en-US.name: Pronunciations
en-US.summary: Learn how to pronounce a word by spelling it out to Alexa.
en-US.updatesDescription: Support for Alexa Presentation Language was added. Instead of a plain text card, the skill now presents visually pleasing cards using APL.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
try to pronounce short words.
try to pronounce long words.
try to pronounce single letters.
try to pronounce words with a small misspell.
try to pronounce random letters.
try to pronounce words (as against giving spellings).
